description: Object type for type=adapter adapter_type=lmdb env conf entries.

mapsize.description: Size of the memory map to use for the environment. The size should be a multiple of OS page size
mapsize.label: Map Size

maxdbs.description: Maximum number of named databases for the environment.
maxdbs.label: Max Databases

maxreaders.description: Number of reader slots allocated in the lock file.
maxreaders.label: Max Readers

mode.description: Database file mode (in decimal) for LMDB.
mode.label: Mode
